20110128131008.000|20110128131010.000|CC1|>> THAT MUST BE WORRYING FOR THE
20110128131010.000|20110128131011.000|CC1|EGYPTIAN GOVERNMENT.

20110128131013.000|20110128131016.000|CC1|>> EXACTLY.                     
20110128131016.000|20110128131019.000|CC1|WHEN THIS WAVE OF FORCES STARTED
20110128131019.000|20110128131021.000|CC1|ON TUESDAY, THEY WERE LEFT TO   
20110128131021.000|20110128131025.000|CC1|PROTEST LARGELY WITHOUT         
20110128131025.000|20110128131027.000|CC1|INTERFERENCE BY THE SECURITY    
20110128131027.000|20110128131027.000|CC1|FORCES.                         
20110128131027.000|20110128131032.000|CC1|AT MIDNIGHT, THE SECURITY BROKE 
20110128131032.000|20110128131033.000|CC1|THE BIGGEST SQUARE IN DOWNTOWN  
20110128131033.000|20110128131036.000|CC1|CAIRO.                          
20110128131036.000|20110128131038.000|CC1|AFTER THAT, THE POLICE HAVE BEEN
20110128131038.000|20110128131040.000|CC1|USING A LOT OF VIOLENCE TO BREAK
20110128131040.000|20110128131041.000|CC1|UP THE DEMONSTRATIONS AND THEY  
20110128131041.000|20110128131043.000|CC1|JUST KEEP COMING.               
20110128131043.000|20110128131046.000|CC1|A LOT OF THE SECURITY FORCES SAY
20110128131046.000|20110128131047.000|CC1|THEY HAVE NOT HAD ANY SLEEP FOR 
20110128131047.000|20110128131051.000|CC1|A FEW DAYS.                     
20110128131051.000|20110128131053.000|CC1|THEY ARE QUITE A STRETCH.       
20110128131053.000|20110128131054.000|CC1|>> DOES IT FEEL TO YOU THAT THE 
20110128131054.000|20110128131056.000|CC1|AUTHORITIES CAN CONTAIN THIS?   
20110128131056.000|20110128131100.000|CC1|>> IT IS NOT CLEAR TO BE HONEST.
20110128131100.000|20110128131101.000|CC1|FROM THE REPORTS WE'RE HEARING  
20110128131101.000|20110128131103.000|CC1|TODAY THAT PEOPLE ARE MARCHING  
20110128131103.000|20110128131107.000|CC1|ALL OVER THE COUNTRY -- I MEAN, 
20110128131107.000|20110128131108.000|CC1|THE SECURITY APPARATUS IN EGYPT 
20110128131108.000|20110128131109.000|CC1|IS BIG AND STRONG, BUT IT HAS   
20110128131109.000|20110128131112.000|CC1|NEVER BEEN FACED WITH SOMETHING 
20110128131112.000|20110128131120.000|CC1|SO HUGE, AT LEAST SINCE 1977.   
20110128131120.000|20110128131122.000|CC1|THE FORMER PRESIDENT HAD TO GIVE
20110128131122.000|20110128131123.000|CC1|IN AND DISMISS HIS CABINET.     
20110128131123.000|20110128131124.000|CC1|SO FAR, THE GOVERNMENT IS NOT   
20110128131124.000|20110128131130.000|CC1|GIVING IN AT ALL.               
20110128131130.000|20110128131137.000|CC1|JUST TO ADD, OUR COLLEAGUE WAS  
20110128131137.000|20110128131140.000|CC1|BEATEN UP BY THE SECURITY.      
20110128131140.000|20110128131144.000|CC1|A LOT OF JOURNALISTS HAVE BEEN  
20110128131144.000|20110128131149.000|CC1|ROUNDED UP AND DETAINED TODAY.  
20110128131149.000|20110128131152.000|CC1|>> HOW CRITICAL IS THE ARMY?

20110128131155.000|20110128131156.000|CC1|ARE THEY RELATIVELY PASSIVE IN

20110128131202.000|20110128131204.000|CC1|FROM THE ARMY SO FAR YET.

20110128131212.000|20110128131218.000|CC1|TO REQUESTS BY THE PRESIDENT?

20110128131219.000|20110128131221.000|CC1|IT HAS NOT HAPPENED IN TUNISIA. 
20110128131221.000|20110128131222.000|CC1|NO ONE REALLY KNOWS WHAT WILL   
20110128131222.000|20110128131223.000|CC1|HAPPEN IF THE PRESIDENT ASKED

20110128131225.000|20110128131226.000|CC1|>> THANK YOU VERY MUCH FOR

20110128131326.000|20110128131329.000|CC1|MONITORED CLOSELY.
